title: My Simping System - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Romance   Xuanhuan
tags: Cheats   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Older Love Interests   Reincarnated in Another World   System Administrator   Tsundere
author: 弓呆
description:
Ye An travels into a novel world, becomes a villain, loses his cultivation base, but also activates the simping system.

As long as he completes the system tasks wholeheartedly, he can get rewards.
Therefore, he must accumulate strength and use all the points to deal with the protagonist in the future.

However, what he doesn’t expect is that no matter what he does, he just cannot get the system points.

Chikusho (God damn it)…>
